remarks: Value of a lattice dilation under its co-atom.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)
statement:
ldilval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ldilval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ldilval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ldilval.d $e |- D = ( ( LDil ` K ) ` W ) $.
ldilval $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. D /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> ( F ` X ) = X ) $.
